title: Spanish nationalists in brutal clashes with Catalan separatists ahead of day of mass strikes
text:
Police battled to keep right-wing extremists clashing with pro-independence supporters on a fourth night of violence in Barcelona.

Officers were seen firing foam bullets at radicals carrying Spanish flags after having bottles and other missiles thrown at them as they attempted to stop them confronting a rival group.

Video footage showed some Spanish nationalists making the Nazi salutes, their faces covered with clothes and motorbike helmets as they pushed other protesters and police officer

The group was dispersed, triggering further violent clashes nearby. A video shot by a resident filmed a group of far-Right supporters surrounding a man and kicking and beating him with poles.

A woman could be heard shouting in Spanish ‘Para, para, para’ - Spanish for ‘stop, stop, stop’ as she looked on helpless from an apartment above as around half a dozen people carrying Spanish flags raced up to their victim and kicked and punched him to the ground.
description: Police battled to keep right-wing extremists clashing with pro-independence supporters on a fourth night of violence in Barcelona.
